name: Hackermon - Evil Edition
description:
You wake up in a bed, which isn’t yours. You don’t recognize the room. You leave the door, only to wake up in this strange room again. You decide to try again and again...

Hackermon - Evil Edition was made by me, for the Lum Dare 47 with the theme

STUCK IN A LOOP

using Game Maker 2 as base engine and bfxr.net for sound effects. As I'm primaly a programmer, the art and sound effects aren't anything special.

Controls (don’t worry, there’s an in-game manual):

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • Space to skip text
  • F12 to swith mode
  • Arrow keys to navigate through menus
  • Enter to confirm
